title: FairFX Multicurrency Web
description: The FairFX Multicurrency web makes it easy to manage, pause and replace your multicurrency card online, along with addding and exchanging money on the go!
team: Jamie Halvorson, Mahedi Hasan, Tabasom Aryamanesh

title: Geometry Web Component Library
description: The Geometry component library provides reusable design components for the developers to use across their projects, giving all a uniform experience and look.
team: Jamie Halvorson, Mahedi Hasan, Tabasom Aryamanesh
